author: RKHCKP
post_text: February 9, 2015 at 12:16 AM#1trying to export my macros via OnPC showfile and everytime i press the "e" i get Edit, or ctrl "e" i get nothing or alt "e" i get effect.  i am trying to export macros from specific macros so I can import them inot another show file.how do I get the OnPC commandline to allow me to type syntax to export items?thanks in advancekeith

posts.author: RKHCKP
posts.post_text: February 9, 2015 at 12:16 AM#1trying to export my macros via OnPC showfile and everytime i press the "e" i get Edit, or ctrl "e" i get nothing or alt "e" i get effect.  i am trying to export macros from specific macros so I can import them inot another show file.how do I get the OnPC commandline to allow me to type syntax to export items?thanks in advancekeith

posts.author: Duplicate MarkvanderMeulen
posts.post_text: February 9, 2015 at 9:16 AM#2Make a view which includes the commandline, than click on it and just type " export macro X " followed by the please button, or go to setup>import export> export> macro and select the macro you would like to export and than click export at the bottom right of your screen

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: February 9, 2015 at 9:39 AM#3you need to disable shortcut-mode (upper right corner on main window), to be able to type in keywords.

posts.author: RKHCKP
posts.post_text: February 9, 2015 at 1:43 PM#4thanks, disable shortcut, that is what i needed!!k

title: copy / import
